p: The assessment of the antimicrobial activity in essential oils used in our study was determined by the disc diffusion method compared to E. coli, S. aureus, S. Thypi, and C. koseri. The tested pathogenic bacteria are repeatedly implicated in the occurrence of many diseases [ 51]. Our study showed that all essential oils that were used displayed a differing level of antimicrobial activity compared to pathogenic bacteria ( Table 2).
